tool_description: UPC / EAN Barcode lookup returns product name and image
name: UPC EAN LOOKUP With Image
title: UPC EAN LOOKUP With Image

api_list.name: UPC/EAN LOOKUP
api_list.description: UPC / EAN BARCODE LOOKUP with Image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://upc-ean-lookup-with-image.p.rapidapi.com/barcode/619659097318"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upc-ean-lookup-with-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://upc-ean-lookup-with-image.p.rapidapi.com/barcode/{digits}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "upc-ean-lookup-with-image.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
